reviews.review: Big learning curve but can be very fun on both sides.
I already wanted to play this game from 2018, at that time I didn't have a PC. But, I can only play now because already have a PC(*¬¥„Éº`)ÔºæœâÔºæ

Very good game, very enjoyable.

I'd recommend play survivor side with friends, it's a lot more enjoyable.
Killer is more of a solo thing, the only exception is custom games, playing with 4 other friends 1 killer 4 survivors, now that is very fun.
The game can be a huge pain sometimes, but playing with friends defo makes up for it :D
Only play this game if you like being mad and/or making other people mad
Very fun game. Each round is different, and it is so good I got it on Xbox and here. I would highly recommend this game if you are looking for a fun and exciting game.
stunning game, once i started i could not stop, been playing for a year now exactly almost daily,  super addicting.
